mapper.select: SELECT totalVisits, totalUser, collectionVolume, CONCAT(IFNULL(ROUND(collectionVolume / totalUser * 100, 2),0), '%') as collectionRate, IFNULL(CONCAT( FLOOR(totalTime / totalUser / 60), ' 分钟 ', totalTime / totalUser % 60, ' 秒' ),0) as averageTime FROM (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(wfsc.total_visits), 0) as totalVisits, count(wfsc.id) as totalUser, IFNULL((SELECT count(wfsa.id) from we_form_survey_answer wfsa WHERE wfsa.belong_id=wfsc.belong_id AND date_format(wfsa.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) BETWEEN #{weFormSurveyCount.beginTime} and #{weFormSurveyCount.endTime} ), 0) as collectionVolume, IFNULL(SUM(wfsc.total_time),0) as totalTime FROM we_form_survey_count wfsc WHERE date_format(wfsc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) BETWEEN #{weFormSurveyCount.beginTime} and #{weFormSurveyCount.endTime} and wfsc.belong_id = #{weFormSurveyCount.belongId} ) as subquery
